description: Try stand-up paddleboarding on Aasee Lake for a fun and refreshing water activity.

locationInfo.description: Glide across the water on a paddleboard while enjoying scenic city and nature views.
safetyTips: Wear a life jacket for safety.
Start in calm water if you're a beginner.

activity: Guided Walking Tour of Schloss Münster
description: Discover the history and architecture of Schloss Münster with a guided walking tour.

locationInfo.description: Explore the grand Münster Palace, its surrounding gardens, and learn about its historical significance.
safetyTips: Bring a bottle of water to stay hydrated.
Stay on designated paths in the gardens.

activity: Sunset Bike Ride on the Promenade
description: Enjoy a relaxing bike ride around Münster’s famous green promenade during sunset.

locationInfo.description: A scenic loop circling Münster’s city center, perfect for an evening ride with a sunset view.
safetyTips: Use bike lights as it gets darker.
Keep a steady pace and watch for pedestrians.
Wear light, breathable clothing for comfort.

description: Take a scenic nature hike in Sentruper Höhe, a peaceful green space near Münster Zoo.

locationInfo.description: A relaxing hiking trail with a mix of wooded areas, open fields, and gentle hills.
safetyTips: Wear proper hiking shoes for uneven terrain.
Bring insect repellent for wooded areas.
Carry a reusable water bottle to stay hydrated.

description: Observe rare bird species in their natural habitat at this famous wetland reserve.

locationInfo.description: A guided or self-paced walk through birdwatching stations in this protected nature reserve.
safetyTips: Wear muted colors to avoid disturbing wildlife.
Stay on marked trails to protect the environment.
